Package labBClimateMonitoringClient

Class ConnectionManager

java.lang.Object
labBClimateMonitoringClient.ConnectionManager
public class ConnectionManager extends Object
Class implementing the Singleton design pattern that handles all client-server communication.

    • searchArea

      public ArrayList<InterestedArea> searchArea(String name)
      Method to search for the name of an area
      Parameters:
      name - the name to search, the server will look for similar names in the DB
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all the matching InterestedArea objects found

    • searchArea

      public ArrayList<InterestedArea> searchArea(Double lat, Double lon)
      Method to search for areas matching a certain latitude and longitude
      Parameters:
      lat - the latitude to search for
      lon - the longitude to search for
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing all the matching InterestedArea objects found

    • viewArea

      public ArrayList<ClimateParameters> viewArea(String name)
      Method to retrieve all the ClimateParameters pertaining an area of interest
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the area to look for
      Returns:
      an ArrayList containing the ClimateParameters to be shown to the user
